signature.instructions: Given an image of a capsule, identify any signs of defects such as cracks, scratches, pokes, or faulty imprints. Classify the capsule into one of the following categories: crack, scratch, poke, faulty_imprint, squeeze, or good. Provide a detailed reasoning to support the classification decision.

fields.description: path to an image to be classified

fields.prefix: Reasoning: Let's think step by step in order to
